Text: The scene should start splitting movies into six cassettes so we could jump back in time another couple of decades. 2 cd's? Wake up.
GREAT release by diamond, pretty badly pixeled for the other release names

At last a Perfect copy, Proper DVDRip and a fast download... 
A/10 
V/10 
Have download quite a few copies of this movie over the last two days and this is certainly the best copy out there, and is well worth the extra meg... 
Many Thanx to TvTeam and DiAMOND for an Excellent copy and Thanx to all the seeders for a quick download...:)
